github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Generate a commit message following Conventional Commits.
Use one of the following prefixes: feat:, fix:, chore:, docs:, style:, refactor:, perf:, test:.
If breaking changes exist, include 'BREAKING CHANGE:' in the commit body.
The first line should be concise (max 40 characters) and describe the change clearly.
Use present tense and imperative mood, e.g., 'Add login button', not 'Added' or 'Adds'.
Include a detailed description in the commit body if necessary.
